SEARCH
Package org.example.oopproject1.controller

Class JobController

java.lang.Object
org.example.oopproject1.controller.JobController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/jobs") public class JobController extends Object
REST controller for managing job postings.

Provides endpoints to create, retrieve, update, delete, and search jobs, with optional pagination and role-based access control.

Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • getAllJobs

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Job>> getAllJobs()
      Retrieves all jobs in the system.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of all Job objects and HTTP 200 status

    • getPagedJobs

      @GetMapping("/paged") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Job>> getPagedJobs(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="postDate") String sortBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="desc") String direction)
      Retrieves a paginated and sorted list of jobs.
      Parameters:
      page - zero-based page index (default 0)
      size - the size of the page to be returned (default 10)
      sortBy - the field by which to sort results (default "postDate")
      direction - sort direction, either "asc" or "desc" (default "desc")
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a Page of Job objects and HTTP 200 status

    • getJobById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Job> getJobById(@PathVariable String id)
      Retrieves a specific job by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the job
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the Job object and HTTP 200 status

    • createJob

      @PostMapping @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'RECRUITER\') or hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Job> createJob(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Job job, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Creates a new job posting. Accessible by RECRUITER or ADMIN.
      Parameters:
      job - the Job object to create
      authentication - the security context authentication
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the created Job and HTTP 201 status

    • updateJob

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Job> updateJob(@PathVariable String id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid Job job)
      Updates an existing job posting by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the job to update
      job - the updated Job object
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated Job and HTTP 200 status

    • deleteJob

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteJob(@PathVariable String id)
      Deletes a job posting by ID. Accessible only by ADMIN.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the job to delete
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP 204 (No Content) status

    • getJobsByCompany

      @GetMapping("/company/{company}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Job>> getJobsByCompany(@PathVariable String company)
      Retrieves jobs filtered by company name.
      Parameters:
      company - the company name to filter jobs by
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of Job objects and HTTP 200 status

    • getPagedJobsByCompany

      @GetMapping("/company/{company}/paged") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Job>> getPagedJobsByCompany(@PathVariable String company, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="postDate") String sortBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="desc") String direction)
      Retrieves a paginated list of jobs filtered by company name.
      Parameters:
      company - the company name to filter jobs by
      page - zero-based page index
      size - page size
      sortBy - field to sort by
      direction - sort direction ("asc" or "desc")
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a Page of Job objects and HTTP 200 status

    • searchJobsByKeyword

      @GetMapping("/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Job>> searchJobsByKeyword(@RequestParam("keyword") String keyword)
      Searches jobs by a single keyword across title, company, description, location and employmentType.

    • searchPagedJobsByKeyword

      @GetMapping("/search/paged") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Job>> searchPagedJobsByKeyword(@RequestParam("keyword") String keyword, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="postDate") String sortBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="desc") String direction)
      Searches for jobs by a single keyword across title, company, description, location and employmentType, with pagination.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the term to search across multiple job fields
      page - zero-based page index (default 0)
      size - page size (default 10)
      sortBy - field to sort by (default "postDate")
      direction - sort direction ("asc" or "desc", default "desc")

    • getActiveJobsByLocation

      @GetMapping("/location/{location}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Job>> getActiveJobsByLocation(@PathVariable String location)
      Retrieves active jobs by location.
      Parameters:
      location - the location to filter active jobs
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of active Job objects and HTTP 200 status

    • getPagedActiveJobsByLocation

      @GetMapping("/location/{location}/paged") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Job>> getPagedActiveJobsByLocation(@PathVariable String location, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="postDate") String sortBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="desc") String direction)
      Retrieves active jobs by location with pagination.
      Parameters:
      location - the location to filter active jobs
      page - zero-based page index
      size - page size
      sortBy - field to sort by
      direction - sort direction ("asc" or "desc")
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a Page of active Job objects and HTTP 200 status

    • getPagedJobsByRecruiter

      @GetMapping("/recruiter/{recruiterId}/paged") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Job>> getPagedJobsByRecruiter(@PathVariable String recruiterId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="postDate") String sortBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="desc") String direction)
      Retrieves jobs posted by a specific recruiter with pagination.
      Parameters:
      recruiterId - the ID of the recruiter
      page - zero-based page index
      size - page size
      sortBy - field to sort by
      direction - sort direction ("asc" or "desc")
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a Page of Job objects and HTTP 200 status
